files.help:
Supported since _27.1_.

You can move the file to _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/emacs/init.el_.

Currently unsupported.

_Relevant issue:_ "Legacy paths have precedence over XDG paths. Emacs will never create XDG_CONFIG_HOME/emacs/." according to XDG.

Looks to be supported natively. However, according to XDG "Legacy paths have precedence over XDG paths. Emacs will never create _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/emacs/_".
Move at your own risk.

You can move the file to _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/emacs_.
